description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              • Update all documents & records
              
              • organize document reviews
              
              • Receive all working papers and reports
              
              • Construct a system implementation plan – liaise with SHEQ Manager
              
              • Monitor implementation progress with regard to documentation and requirements (set up of spreadsheets)
              
              • Schedule meetings on system implementation
              
              • Identify gaps and raise CAR
              

              • Co-ordinate the logging of corrective actions and implementing of preventive measures
              
              • Ensure incident investigations are done for all incidents
              
              • Liaise with Clinic regarding H&S statistics
              
              • Updated EOSH statistics / incident
              
              • Implementation of Local requirements & TCCMS requirements
              

              • Schedule & organize legal surveys and implementation of action plans
              
              • Effective SHE communication in the plant, external warehouse, and distribution centers.
              
              • Ensure SHE training is conducted for all levels in all functions
              
              • Assist all functions with writing of procedures and updating of documents
              
              • Participate in Internal Audits
              
              • Train all relevant parties on document & data control and assess them
              
              • Co-ordinate the logging of Corrective Action and assist with the implementation of preventive measures
              
              • Coordinate with training coordinator to get training as per TCCMS requirment and necessary needs
              

              • Strong knowledge of FSSC 22000, ISO 9001:2008 and other related quality management system.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Graduated from university, major in Food, Biology, or quality Management or Food Technology.
              
              - At least 2 -3 year experience in managing quality system in manufacturing environment
              
              - Qualified lead Auditor
              
              - Computer literate
              
              - Fluent in English, especially in reading and writing technical documents ( must have).
              
              - ISO 22000 Internal auditor Certified is a must
              
              - Have knowledge of 5S, GLP, Local Law
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
